website_summaries.verdict: The Oculus Touch is the best virtual reality motion control system we've tested, putting the Rift functionally on par with the Vive at a much lower price.
pros: Second sensor expands the area in which the Rift can function
cons: Second sensor further clutters desks and occupies USB ports

customer_reviews.title: Seen to be believed
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable experience, the controllers look nothing until you see them in VR. I won't babble on about my experience, it's hard to explain. So much realism and immersion I was looking down to see my legs due to the fact I could see my 'hands' in VR. You really have to see these things to be convinced. I'm sick of all the rivalry between, Oculus, Hive and PSVR they are all good in their own right, I chose the Rift as I wasn't really bothered much about 'Roomspace' although the Rift is almost able to do this with the addition of a third sensor, I hear.
customer_reviews.author: Macker

customer_reviews.title: Changing VR forever!
customer_reviews.text: I can't quite put them into words, other than "life changing" and "Insane." You'll never understand how utterly amazing these controllers are, until you try them. You can obviously do so much more than with a 360 controller, but i mean SO MUCH MORE! Play Robo Recall for more than 5 minutes and you'll be gun slinging, dual wielding pistols, catching and throwing back bullets from mid-air, rippling limbs off robots ... omg its insane! Beat saber has won my heart. Think Guitar Hero but in VR ... but with light sabers!! 11/10 - absolutely needed beyond words! They change VR like nothing you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Carter

customer_reviews.title: but just to say these are possibly the most comfortable controllers I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I already commented a little with my Rift review, but just to say these are possibly the most comfortable controllers I have ever used. They have a specific purpose, and would not replace a standard controller where that was appropriate, but for what they do, they are amazing. They give a very strong sense of holding and interacting in viritual reality. The essentially make it feel real.
customer_reviews.author: Brian walsh

customer_reviews.title: Bought a gaming PC? Bought and Oculus? Clearly you've got money to burn so get these!
customer_reviews.text: Really help the experience on Oculus. Loads of games to play in the Oculus store most of them not too expensive. Can play Vive games using these and even though I'll probably get another two cameras you can do room scale with two cameras! These feel so much better than the Vive Controllers, the Vive ones feel like you're holding a WiiMote or remote control, however, the Touch sort of sit on top of your hands and because the soft grip you can move your fingers without realising there's a controller in your hand. Only changed the batteries once after 50 hours of play. Great addon for the Oculus
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A new era has begun
customer_reviews.text: I have had the rift for a couple of months and was excited to get these controllers and wow its like a whole new era has began! before i felt more of a watcher in VR now i feel a apart of it...the immersion is amazing and i cant wait to see how it can be really used as the new games that maximize these are released
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Rift is an amazing product especially at this price and the best of the three I've owned (Vive, PSVR and Rift + Dk2)
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a main review over on the bundled deal, but for some reason its not showing as verified purchase as my order was processed as the touch and rift separately. So am leaving this here as validation of my review over there:  Short version is Rift is an amazing product especially at this price and the best of the three I've owned (Vive, PSVR and Rift + Dk2)
customer_reviews.author: sf

customer_reviews.title: They feel nice in the hands
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! Just get them, stop pondering. Waited a year from first getting the Rift. Finally gave in as so much more content is arriving and requiring the use of these. They feel nice in the hands, very natural and intuitive. Makes the virtual experiences so much more engaging and enjoyable. At just shy of £100, they do seem a little overpriced as an accessory to an already-expensive item, but these are adding so much pleasure to using the Rift.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Double-U

customer_reviews.title: They are decent
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaint with the product, which works well so far. I am just a bit sore I was made to buy them - oculus driving me onto these despite having no interest in anything other than sim racing.
customer_reviews.author: Uttershambles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent controllers fantastically designed.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best virtual reality controllers available right now. The ability to pick up thumb, forefinger and middle finger movements makes it a lot more immersive and fun too. They feel really good and comfortable to hold and always feel intuitive and streamlined. If you're still a standard gamepad for the Oculus Rift, put it down and get these now.
customer_reviews.author: Dil Khan

customer_reviews.title: Touch of class
customer_reviews.text: Have had a Rift since the Kickstarter days, but have been really slow buying the Touch controllers. Now I see they are totally worth it and transform your VR experience - very, very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Oculus Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Vive may have an edge with head tracking. But Oculus's touch controllers are far beyond the current controllers for vive. This is a must get for a far more advanced VR immersion.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They move perfectly with your hands. Very intuitive to use. The battery's last a good long while but I recommend picking up some 2500 rechargeables (1 AA battery for each hand). Very robust too. I've punched the wall 3-4 times now and all its done is mark the controller a little. All works great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Forrest

customer_reviews.title: A must for an oculus rift
customer_reviews.text: These work well and have brought new life into my oculus rift. With the free games that came with them they're worth every penny. I've also got an HTC Vive but I prefer the oculus controllers.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: its a really good piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up as part of the Rift + Touch bundle, its a really good piece of kit. The accuracy in vr with it was quite surprising and the controllers are nice and sturdy. Well worth picking up if you have the rift as there are some really good games out for it.
customer_reviews.author: mozza54

customer_reviews.title: ... Touch controller is extremely well designed and feels really comfortable in your hands
customer_reviews.text: The Touch controller is extremely well designed and feels really comfortable in your hands. The placement of the buttons/triggers feels very natural, and the build quality is very high. All in all I am very impressed with the design and amazed how well controller actions are mirrored as hand movements in-game.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Touch controllers get 5 star. It's an incredible experience, you get so immersed you just forget about things - unless you start bumping into walls and objects when you ignore the boundary that clearly lights up in front of you. Roomscale on both Oculus and Steam VR works pretty well with just the 2 included sensors. Can't wait to try with a 3rd sensor - just wish Amazon would sell these!
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: most controls are easy to pick up and remember
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive, most controls are easy to pick up and remember. Pretty durable, they can take a few bashes into walls without a problem (I need more space).
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Oculus Touch is simply fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I was stubbornly saying that I didn't want roomscale/touch experiences with Rift. I bought the Touch Controller to play Superhot VR and that all changed. There's no going back. Oculus Touch is simply fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: RagingAvatar

customer_reviews.title: Bought as part of a bundle with the Oculus Rift ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as part of a bundle with the Oculus Rift headset for £399. At that price decided to take the plunge. I had a PC with a fast i5 and GTX 970 graphics card already, which appears to bethe minimum spec. This is, without doubt, the most significant development in years. Buy it and the game Lone Echo and - oh boy.
customer_reviews.author: BeanMunster

customer_reviews.title: nice controllers
customer_reviews.text: nice controllers but lacking clasps to attach to your hands. would have loved to not have to hold them for some things smooth operating buttons
customer_reviews.author: R. Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Great design and
customer_reviews.text: The oculus is lost without these! They're really ergonomic and you forget you have them on after seconds. Great design and practicality
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: great must have for any oculus rift owner
customer_reviews.text: VR is just great with these to grab and soot things with. solid build also as i have punched my wall a good few times to find more damage to my wall that the device.

customer_reviews.title: Much more better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Finally cheaper. Much more better than expected, this gives you very good immersion in VR world.

customer_reviews.title: Most natural VR controllers
customer_reviews.text: Good controllers maybe a touch small for me as i have big hands but very natural to use and add a lot to the VR experience.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any VR enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: A miracle of human-computer interaction on par with the invention of the mouse. Full review over at bitfalls dot com, but suffice it to say that this is by far the best gaming peripheral I have ever owned, and I have both the G29 Logitech Wheel, and the Hotas Warthog flight stick with throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device and works seamlessly with the Rift and interaction ...
customer_reviews.text: Frankly if you own an Rift you will own these. You can't own a Rift without having these. Amazing device and works seamlessly with the Rift and interaction is flawless. When you get these and the games/apps that use it you will never own a playstation/xbox etc. again.

customer_reviews.title: If you have an Oculus you NEED these!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to Oculus rift brings movement to VR making the experience 100x better. The controls themselves are very well made and great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Makes VR so much better
customer_reviews.text: Lets you use your hands in VR, what more do you want, grab guns, throw knives, massively increases immersion.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant technology.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, you just cannot get the full experience unless you are running these as well. They make everything that much more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Scott W Stenning

customer_reviews.title: But its still a great experience. Love playing "Robo Recall" and "Dead & ...
customer_reviews.text: Thumb sensor on the left controller does not work properly. But its still a great experience. Love playing "Robo Recall" and "Dead & Burried". Lone echo is, for me, the best VR Game and experience EVER. Can't wait to try something else with my controllers.

customer_reviews.title: No Rift should ever be without these, just a ...

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the Oculus Rift
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of kit. Works perfectly first time and when wearing the Rift they look like disembodied hands which mimic the movement of your hands perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Came with will packed and the kit looks amazing can't wait to get my Oculus Rift now to ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with will packed and the kit looks amazing can't wait to get my Oculus Rift now to try this amazing kit ^^
customer_reviews.author: Nez

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Much better tracking than the PSVR and better in your hand than the HTC Vive, The circular part around your hand has 26 sensors in it which allows index finger and thumb tracking. You get 7 free pieces of software with it, including Robo Recall. If you hav a Rift already then you cannot not have these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool items, my small room doesnt do them justice ...
customer_reviews.text: cool items , my small room doesnt do them justice though and they eat batteries , get some good rechargeables and a charger to go with these and save frustration :)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tj Walsh

customer_reviews.title: it feels so natural to use and it is super responsive. Good to see technology finally living up ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Oculus rift and have not picked this up, then I have only one thing to tell you. "WHY?". This device is all the difference in the VR experience. it feels so natural to use and it is super responsive. Good to see technology finally living up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Andani Kamel Wun-Nam

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Bought with the rify headset. Piontless without them. Good buy even if a little pricey at the present time.

customer_reviews.text: Truly immersive controllers, that you can get used to very fast, and after a couple of hours you'll get really used to it. The only thing lacking is the 360° capabilities right off the bat.

customer_reviews.title: Feel the VR!
customer_reviews.text: The Touch controllers ELEVATE the Rift experience far more than expected... you just have to TRY to believe. YES, is that GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Gaston

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: these just add the extra immersion you need for your rift, they fell really natural to hold once you get over the strange shape, comes with a sensor and oculus notices it right away and talks you through the setup, which only takes about 20min.if you have a rift you need these, just when you are letting your mates play super hot or bullet train stay out of the way,lol i have been slapped a couple of times now.. oh one last thing, make sure you use the straps or you gonna end up chucking them
customer_reviews.author: Gillius

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, the best gadget you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of kit. Very easy to set up and it really feels like your hands on part of the VR world. Just make sure you remove any lights above you or you will keep smashing them! The room mapping is spot on and it really helps avoiding bashing into walls and furniture. This really changes the oculus rift experience, even the motion sickness problems seem to have completely gone. How can this be so cheap and so good! This with the rift is easily the best piece of technology/gadget available, no question. If you love gadgets and technology just get this.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing controllers, easy to set up and a blast to use, they really do breath new life into the Oculus Rift and they're very easy to get used to, the gesture feature works really well too. One thing to be aware of at the moment, is a lot of people are having issues with one of the triggers losing its 'padding'. Be sure to Google it before purchase to be aware of what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: ... now makes the oculus complete and for it the best VR experience so far
customer_reviews.text: Omg this now makes the oculus complete and for it the best VR experience so far.... With the money from Facebook support it I can only seeing things improving overtime. If you have a oculus headset the touch is a must! Amazon how do I get the 2 free games which were advertised on your website!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: These complete the Rift. The best VR experience now. (I had a Vive, its image quality was horrible. Roomscale was its forte, Oculus competes well with touch and the extra base station)
customer_reviews.author: Intrepid

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as I love the idea of getting further into the game environment
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as I love the idea of getting further into the game environment. The one thing that I wasn't prepared for was the nausea I get when using it for periods exceeding half an hour. It's brilliant being "inside" the game and I would use it even more if I could, however it is something to be aware of when making quite a commitment money wise, that it may have an adverse effect in other ways.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Controllers Not Recognized???
customer_reviews.text: It worked great past the first training stage but then stopped. When I Uninstall and reinstall as I first did, I plug in the sensors, I get the tone saying they are recognized, but when the 3 selections for the controller come up it only gives me the option for the button thing and an xbox controller. New batteries, new install, no answers on the web.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One word review: Amazing These controllers are light, intuitive and full of features. You'll be juggling things in VR in no time. If you have the Rift you have to buy the touch controllers. If you don't have the Rift buy it just so you can appreciate these controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great touch controllers
customer_reviews.text: Great touch controllers, it's fun to play with it, the problem is that you can use it only with oculus rift, you cant use them to play game without oculus.
customer_reviews.author: Master

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the space i will have to return this as i do not
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Poulley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, absolutely awesome. Massively superior to the wands of another VR and a augmented reality unit that's yet to be released with hand tracking. I've been lucky enough to play with them all, it was touch that made me decide on keeping the Oculus as it enhances your hands in VR in a great and unique way. Looking forward to recieving the pre-order bundled games. Though I'd recommend very highly the Climb and fruit ninja which are both outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bruiners

customer_reviews.title: Better controls than the Xbox controller!
customer_reviews.text: When you first try these out you wil never go back to the Xbox crontroller. You got to set up the controller which can be a pain because you need at least 3 feet apart from each sensor. When you set up it jumps strait in to a demo and shows you what you can do. When you start using the controller it's so quick and easy to learn also easy to get use to. The controls in the game is more enjoyable with a difference experience control to the Xbox controller. The only thing that disappoints me where are my free games with my Pre - Order? Also plenty of games now in the Oculus Store!
customer_reviews.author: Natwestc

customer_reviews.title: The touch controllers themselves are brilliant, But amazon uk have decided not to give ...
customer_reviews.text: The touch controllers themselves are brilliant, But amazon uk have decided not to give out the pre order bonus codes that come with EVERY touch preorder.. this is unnaceptable imo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I wasted the money on these even though they were cheap
customer_reviews.text: LOL, I can't believe I wasted the money on these even though they were cheap, the whole VR thing is rubbish as the software is just rushed to make money quickly, no quality. they might be worth something one day if the software does ever get better, but by then the Oculus will be replaced so these will be Pointless
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Gosling

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time - Tracking is poor and has been ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time - Tracking is poor and has been since release,, They released a patch that fixed nothing midway through Dec, then released a patch a week ago that made the tracking even worse, so right now I am unable to use my Touch controllers without them flying away in VR... It's been an absolute nightmare trying to fix the tracking with these controllers, so much so I'm on the verge of sending them back as they have never worked as intended since Dec 6th.. Wait for it to be fixed or failing that get a Vive ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Feel Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Very annoued that something i payed £190 for and a few months later they drop the price by £100 what a joke.. But that said still the best controllers i have ever used...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cadden

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed with product
customer_reviews.text: I am very disspaointed with the product! I bought this for my partner for xmas and he hasn't been able to use it and is need more stupid things to wokr! I have spend more than 700.00 so he could use it with no problem.... and now i have to spend anothe 500 for a computer!!?? Which need to be specific for the game! This is jist robbery. I am very unhappy with the fact that i have spend soo much money and my partner can't use it and he need to buy more things for the ovulus rift to work! NOT GOOD AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Oculus Touch Controller
product_meta.description:
Edition:Touch ControllerReach out and touch
Oculus Touch is a pair of tracked controllers that give you hand presence—the feeling that your virtual hands are actually your own. It takes interaction to the next level.

Immerse your hands in VR
Touch enables natural hand presence, requiring little thought about how to use your virtual hands or what to do with them. Think of it as a pair of human hands in the virtual world.

Intuitive interaction
Touch lets you manipulate all kinds of objects in the virtual space with precision. Pick up toys, drop blocks, throw firecrackers, and fire laser guns—all with intuitive, natural hand movement.


Unlock human expression
Touch lets you make social gestures like point, wave, and give a thumbs-up. Combined with multiplayer experiences, it unlocks a social element that’s never been experienced in VR.

Familiar inputs. New experiences.
Touch controllers feature traditional action buttons, thumb-sticks and analog triggers that add familiarity to new experiences. These are your controls for grasping, lifting, and more.

An entire new medium.
A groundbreaking creative platform from Oculus designed exclusively for Touch, Medium lets you manipulate digital clay with your virtual hands. Sculpt 3D shapes, build physics-defying objects, and create beautiful works of art

BOX CONTAINS
2 Touch controllers
1 sensor
Rock Band connector
feature_bullets: Bring your real hands into virtual environments with this pair of controllers for Oculus Rift
Natural gestures and finger movement create a sense of true hand presence for more realistic, memorable, and tactile VR
Constellation tracking lets you manipulate objects in your virtual environment with extraordinary precision
Explore an expansive list of groundbreaking new Touch experiences on the Oculus Store
This is an Oculus Rift accessory only. Rift headset required and sold separately
